name: Plank
instructions: Hold a forearm plank maintaining a straight line from head to heels.
Engage core and glutes.
Breathe steadily throughout the hold.
tips: Avoid sagging hips; keep ribs down.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from bar and raise knees toward chest.
Lower slowly to full hang with control.
Keep torso stable—avoid swinging.
tips: Progress to straight-leg raises when ready.
ratingDesc: Excellent for lower-abs and hip flexor control.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on back, alternate elbow-to-opposite-knee cycling motion.
Keep lower back pressed into floor.
Use slow, controlled motion.
tips: Avoid neck pulling; use core to rotate torso.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit and lean back slightly, rotate torso side-to-side touching floor or ball.
Keep core engaged and control the movement.
Increase difficulty by adding weight.
tips: Keep spine long and breathing steady.

name: Leg Raise
instructions: Lie flat, raise legs to 90° and lower slowly avoiding lumbar arch.
Control eccentric phase for full tension.
Use hands under hips if needed for support.
tips: Keep core braced to protect lower back.
ratingDesc: Powerful lower ab exercise when performed correctly.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in plank and run knees toward chest rapidly alternating.
Maintain steady breathing and stable hips.
Use as a metabolic core movement.
tips: Keep hips level to maximize core engagement.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel and roll wheel forward keeping core braced.
Roll as far as you can while maintaining neutral spine then return.
Progress slowly to increase ROM.
tips: Master plank before using wheel to avoid lumbar strain.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on one side and lift hips into a straight line supported on forearm.
Hold while breathing steadily, switch sides.
Focus on hip height and shoulder stacking.
tips: Keep hips lifted and avoid rotation.
